articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Venue for Final and Super-4 matches likely to be shifted from Colombo | Mint - Mint
articles.description: With Colombo witnessing heavy rains in last few days, the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) is planning to change the venue for the Super Four matches of the Asia Cup
articles.content: The venue for the Asia Cup 2023 Final and Super-4 matches is likely to be shifted from Colombo to Pallekele due to the threat of rain. In that context, the ACC is currently engaged in a discussion wi… [+1578 chars]

articles.title: Jasprit Bumrah to miss India's Asia Cup match vs Nepal, pacer flies to Mumbai - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah will miss India's Asia Cup match against Nepal as the pacer is returning home due to personal reasons. | Cricket
articles.content: Rohit Sharma's Team India will miss the services of pacer Jasprit Bumrah in their crucial match against Nepal in the Asia Cup 2023 on Monday. Pace spearhead Bumrah has returned home amid the ongoing … [+2334 chars]
